title: Dante’s Inferno cantos XXII and XXIII
author: VD
content_html: Next week’s reading is cantos XXIV and XXV. And congratulations to the 42 hardcore Hellmarchers who have persisted to this point. We’re two-thirds of the way through the Nether Regions and there are only six weeks until the final!
content_text:
Next week’s reading is cantos
XXIV and XXV
.  And congratulations to the 42 hardcore Hellmarchers who have persisted to this point.  We’re two-thirds of the way through the Nether Regions and there are only six weeks until the final!
